thread.title: Open sale for OnePlus 2 coming soon for limited time frame
thread.title_full: Open sale for OnePlus 2 coming soon for limited time frame

title: Open sale for OnePlus 2 coming soon for limited time frame
text:
October 4, 2015 16:12 BST OnePlus provides information about OnePlus 2 invites status for October OnePlus 
The Chinese smartphone manufacturer, OnePlus has reasserted that it will open up sales for its 2016 flagship killer smartphone, basically reiterating what company's co-founder Carl Pei had announced in September 2015. This time again the company failed to provide a specific date for the open sale, but says it will happen "soon". 
Open sale means you don't need an invite, instead you can purchase the phone directly. But the sale window will be open for a limited period of time, said the company while providing details about OnePlus 2 invites status in October. 
Carl Pei has earlier said : "Over the past few days, we've been discussing how we can make it up to our fans for the delay. One of the best ideas we have is to open sales up for an hour sometime later this month or early next, to make the entire process a bit more painless for would-be OnePlus 2 users. We will need to look into production and operations to determine when this is most feasible. We'll keep you posted." 
The company further promises to finish rolling out invites for early supporters, active forum members and the reservation list soon. "We focused on early supporters, active forum members and the reservation list," asserts OnePlus in a blog posting. 
The shareable invites that started in September, will be rolled out even aggressively in October, the company firmly said. Those who have purchased the OnePlus 2 in recent past will receive three shareable invites to share with family and friends. More about OnePlus 2
